item.title: About
item.description: Currently Financial Times // June 2019 - Present Software Engineer working on the consumer products team for FT.com Previously Daisie // Nov 2017 â€“ June 2019 Working across the stack, building a social platform for creative collaboration. Built the v1 MVP with React Native & styled-components, integrating with a GraphQL backend, gathering 20,000+ downloads in the first 24 hours. Built a native extension with Objective-C to deal with system level libraries for image and video processing needs
